Package com.flipkart.client

Class CustomerFlipfitMenu

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.client.CustomerFlipfitMenu
public class CustomerFlipfitMenu extends Object
This class represents the menu interface for customers to manage their profiles, bookings, and other customer-related activities in the Flipfit system.
